actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Commerce to sell two obsolete vessels to Coast Line Company, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Commerce to sell, subject to conditions deemed appropriate in the national interest, two named obsolete vessels to a named company.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Commerce to sell two obsolete vessels to Coast Line Company, and for other purposes.
